item.title: Private variables prefixed with underscore?
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The current convention/standard/best practice when it comes to naming private fields on a class, is to prefix the name with an underscore. Turns out, that this convention is all due to a misunderstanding! Explained In version 1.0 of the C# language specification, there was a reference to this and underscore.
